divs: Sighting DetailsI become very exhausted and fell asleep by 5 pm. I awakened at 7pm to fall asleep again at 8pm. Around 3am awakened to feel what I thought was cat claws on my feet. I found myself unable to move my head to look. Ifelt paralize and felt an odd aura. I was laying on my side, and watched a small man enter my room from that position. He w3as holding a light tp the cieling. I lost conscieness. I awkened to what felt like a womaan tucking me in. Then fell back to sleep. I first thought it was my wife. She said it wasn't, and that she had wslept real deep. I thought the little man was my son.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Shutesbury
There was one other sighting in Shutesbury on or around August 16th 2008
